channel.title: Machine Learning on DSG | IIT Roorkee
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on DSG | IIT Roorkee

item.title: Cerebro Hackathon: Lockdown Mania
item.description: Let’s work towards building solutions to the COVID-19 Pandemic applying your Data Science skills. Lockdown Mania

item.title: Recruitment 2020 Results
item.description: Data Science Group welcomes all the new recruits!! It was a very tough choice to select a few candidates from the pool of enthusiastic and talented freshers and sophomores who turned up.

item.title: Cerebro Hackathon: Roti Kapda Makaan
item.description: Let’s kickoff 2020 with our annual ML Competition. Beginners’ Hypothesis Starts at 6:00 PM, 6th Jan.

item.title: Workshop: Machine Learning 2019
item.description: Greetings IIT R! We are back with our workshop on Machine Learning. The workshop is specifically designed for 1st-year students and it would help you get comfortable with basic ML algorithms, their explanation and implementation.

item.title: Cerebro Hackathon: Dolores
item.description: Hi Folks, DSG is launching ‘Dolores’, a 3-day competition on predictive modeling, open for freshers and sophomores, participate and grab this opportunity to enhance your knowledge of Machine Learning.

item.title: Intro To Data Science Libraries
item.description: Greetings IIT R! We are back with the first workshop of the semester. We would be introducing the basics of python and data science libraries such as numpy, pandas, matplotlib, scikit-learn and PyTorch.

item.title: Hackathon: Melodious Medley
item.description: Greetings IITR! Hold your breath as a new era of DS in IIT Roorkee begins. Tonight, we launch CEREBRO, a platform for hosting data hackathons exclusively in IITR developed by SDSLabs.

item.title: Decision Trees. Decoded.
item.description: It’s time to give the Algorithm series, an informative start. Here, we start with one of the most famous category i.
